name: Reactor Core
text: Special Summon 1 "Reactor" monster from your hand or Deck. You cannot Summon monsters for the rest of the turn after you activate this effect except DARK Machine monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; Add 1 "Reactor" Spell or Trap card from your Deck to your hand except "Reactor Core". You can only use each effect of "Reactor Core" once per turn.
